poems.title: Laughter's Echo
poems.author: James White
poems.excerpt: In laughter's echo, joy dances like sunlight on water...
poems.full_text: In laughter's echo, joy dances like sunlight on water. Moments of silliness, like bubbles in champagne, fizzing with infectious delight. Embrace the mirth, for in laughter's embrace, we find solace.

poems.title: The Jester's Song
poems.author: Sophie Adams
poems.excerpt: In jest and jesting, the world's woes wane...
poems.full_text: In jest and jesting, the world's woes wane. A jester's grin, a comic's heart, spinning tales of whimsy and absurdity. For in laughter's court, even kings bow to folly's crown.
